title: What font ?
content:
Can you help me ? i need to know what is this font ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419064424im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4nages_6144.png)

Thanks a lot
author: wikom

comments.content: LES 4 NAGES.COM: looks like [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419064424/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers) (Extended Extra Black Oblique)
